title: Episode 1 – Dianne Brill
description: In episode one, we speak to Forever Queen of the Night Dianne Brill about her dazzling ‘80s-era clubland success and how she navigated the sexual politics of the scene. We discuss her favorite looks, favorite parties, and her legendary friendships with Andy Warhol, Jean-Michel Basquiat, and Keith Haring. The big takeaway? “Andy had a big penis and he had sex. Not many people know that…”
dc:creator: WOW Podcast Network
